SummaryEnglish: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
Aliases: Seraph of the End: Battle in Nagoya
Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign

1.SummaryEnglish: The setup is simple: Shinoa, Yoichi, and Yuichirō are in a classroom or school environment. Shinoa plays a bit of mischief by giving Yuichirō a list of commands (e.g. "look at this", "turn there", etc.), via notes.

2.SummaryEnglish: Shinoa gives Yuichirō his “heart’s desire” (or makes him pick a desired reward) — comically over the top choices. Among the items are things like silver and golden axes, and also Shinoa merchandise. Yuichirō is shown reacting/choosing one, in a humorous way.

3.SummaryEnglish: In this episode, young Yūichirō and young Mika are having a moment in Sanguinem. Yūichirō asks Mika what’s on his mind. After some hesitation, Mika admits that he thinks he has more charm as a main character.

4.SummaryEnglish: Shinoa and Yoichi initiate a “hand‑slap game” with Yu. A hand‑slap or slap‑tag‑type game, where Yu keeps losing each round.

5.SummaryEnglish: They go to a library, where they find a book of secrets. They use a bitter‑tasting truth serum. As a side effect, Kimizuki and Yūichirō start behaving like dogs. They chase Yoichi around, and then fight each other.

6.SummaryEnglish: Kimizuki is tasked with driving the squad, but he takes a wrong turn. They end up at the Saigo Takamori Statue in Ueno.

7.SummaryEnglish: Mitsuba tries attacking Yu with several surprise moves — kicks, tickles, and other unexpected attacks. Yu tries to parry them. He struggles to keep up.

8.SummaryEnglish: Every time Guren tries to exit or leave, somehow he ends up back in the same room. This repeats multiple times.

9.SummaryEnglish: The Shinoa Squad is at school, and Guren is teaching them a lesson.

10.SummaryEnglish:
A lifetime of tragedy - virus attack, captivation by vampires, failed escape plan, and deaths of his family - pushes Yu to live for revenge. However, the tragedy continues as he finds out that the vampires have turned Mikaela into one of them.

Recap of the first cour of "Owari no Seraph".

11.TitleEnglish: Seraph of the End: Vampire Shahal (Jump Festa 2015 Special)
11.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious vampire named Shahal kidnaps a human girl named Riko. Shahal's true goal is unknown, and while he has kidnapped Riko, he refuses to drink her blood. Suddenly, he receives a visit from the vampire nobles Ferid and Crowley. Meanwhile, Guren tasks Shinoa Squad with rescuing Riko and returning her to her family. Originally screened at Jump Festa 2015 events.

12.TitleEnglish: Seraph of the Endless Nagoya Arc 1
12.SummaryEnglish: This episode typically shows the characters preparing or discussing strategy with humorous twists, focusing on character interactions rather than serious combat.

13.TitleEnglish: Seraph of the Endless Nagoya Arc 2
13.SummaryEnglish: The characters face mishaps and misunderstandings during the battle preparations. There is plenty of humorous banter, with characters poking fun at each other’s quirks or abilities.Some gags revolve around the challenges of coordinating the squad or unexpected behavior from members.

14.TitleEnglish: Seraph of the Endless Nagoya Arc 3
14.SummaryEnglish: The episode showcases funny and exaggerated character interactions, often involving playful teasing or misunderstandings. Some scenes highlight the squad’s attempts to coordinate their strategy, but things comically go off-track. There are also moments poking fun at each character’s personality quirks or habits, adding charm and levity to the storyline.

15.TitleEnglish: Seraph of the Endless Nagoya Arc 4
15.SummaryEnglish:
The squad tries to tackle various problems during the arc, but their efforts often lead to humorous misunderstandings or blunders. There’s playful teasing, especially between Yuichirō and other squad members like Shinoa and Kimizuki. Some moments show the squad members struggling with teamwork or getting distracted by silly things, adding to the humor.
The episode may include parodies of serious scenes from the main Nagoya Arc but with exaggerated or goofy twists.

1.SummaryEnglish: A deadly virus sweeps the earth, leaving behind only children and vampires. Yuichiro Hyakuya and the other orphans are captured by these vampires and are forced to provide them blood in order to survive. Fed up, they plan on an escape, but...

2.SummaryEnglish: After his escape from the vampires, Yuichiro learns that humankind hasn't perished. Determined to get his revenge, he joins the Japanese Imperial Demon Army. Four years later, Yuichiro feels his training is enough, but his bad attitude gets him suspended.

3.SummaryEnglish: A student sneaks into the Forbidden Chamber, where the army keeps a demon for training. To show how dangerous a demon is, Shinoa takes Yuichiro and Yoichi there, but her plan fails when Yuichiro ignores Shinoa and starts to fight the demon.

4.SummaryEnglish: Mikaela, who was thought to be dead, was actually turned into a vampire by Krul and is working with them. Meanwhile, Yuichiro starts his first day at the Extermination Unit's training school, but soon gets into a fight with one of his classmates...

5.SummaryEnglish: Eager to obtain the Cursed Gear, Yuichiro tracks down Guren and persuades him to provide him a chance at the Contract Ceremony. Passing Guren's test, Yuichiro, Kimizuki, and Yoichi put their lives on the line to make a contract with the demon kings.

6.SummaryEnglish: Yuichiro, Kimizuki, and Yoichi begin their Contract Ceremony to obtain their own Cursed Gear. The demons attempt to take over their bodies, and while Kimizuki and Yuichiro manage to subjugate them, Yoichi fails the trial and becomes a human-eating demon.

7.SummaryEnglish: With the addition of a new member, Mitsuba, to the squad, they head to Harajuku to find a vampire settlement and destroy it. When they arrive, they see a girl being chased by the Four Horsemen of John. Knowing it's the vampire's trap, Yu goes to save her.

8.SummaryEnglish: With the information obtained from the little girl they saved, Yuichiro and his squad goes to the subway station where the vampires are in order to free the people. However, they quickly learn that everything was a trap from the start...

9.SummaryEnglish: After saving the captured people from vampires, Yu and his unit reach Shinjuku. However, by the time they reach there, the war had already begun and some vampires had gotten through. To prevent Shinjuku from falling, they must fight off the vampires.

10.SummaryEnglish: Learning that Mitsuba, Kimizuki, and Yoichi are in a pinch, Yu and Shinoa rush to their rescue. Meanwhile, Guren and his troops fight off the vampire's main forces, but Ferid's strength seems to be out of their league, cornering Guren in a tough spot.

11.SummaryEnglish: Finally, Mika and Yu reunite, but their circumstances does not allow for much time. Mika tries to "save" Yu from the humans, who have been experimenting on him, but Yu wants to save his squad. Torn between Mika and his squad, something in Yu is awakened...

12.SummaryEnglish: Trying to figure out what happened to Yu, Shinoa tracks down Guren and asks what he’s conspiring to do. However, Guren doesn't answer and keeps it a mystery. When Yu finally wakes up from a seven-day-coma, he explains he doesn't remember what happened.

13.SummaryEnglish: Yu is caught in the middle of a political fight between Guren and Kureto Hiragi. However, Yu's determined to take care of his family - new or old. He assures Guren that he's on his side no matter what, and turns to him for help in saving Mika.

14.SummaryEnglish: To start the training of the Cursed Gears, the Shinoa squad moves outside the wall to keep the damage to a minimum in case their demons get the best of them. Yu and Kimizuki must overcome their trauma to prove their psychological strength to their demons.

15.SummaryEnglish: Kureto orders a suicide mission to Guren; wage a war against vampire nobles in Nagoya with only 100 men. Guren needs all the help he can get and brings the Shinoa squad into this mission. Meanwhile, the vampire main units also prepare to head to Nagoya.

16.SummaryEnglish: When the Shinoa squad arrives late, they realize just how serious this mission is for Guren. Knowing this is an impossible mission where many will die, Guren puts his emotions aside and orders his men to not necessarily survive, but to win.

17.SummaryEnglish: The Shinoa squad and Narumi squad join forces to carry out their mission - to kill the Fifteenth Progenitor, Lucal Wesker. While they succeed in their mission without losing anybody, others were not so lucky. Nine teams fail and were taken as hostages...

18.SummaryEnglish: The Shinoa squad re-learns the hard cold fact that it's very possible to lose comrades, but there's no time to mourn. They must move on to go rescue the hostages. Right after their departure, Mika and the other vampires arrive to Nagoya as well.

19.SummaryEnglish: Guren, Shinoa, and Narumi squads arrive at the city hall and see the hostages. Knowing it's a set-up, they still decide to go save the hostages, but Guren and Shinya are way over their heads with Crowley, as they struggle just to run away from him.

20.SummaryEnglish: Shinoa's squad goes to save Guren, but unfortunately, they run out of time. Reluctantly, they leave him behind and retreat, but Yu just cannot bring himself to do that. Instead, he takes more of the Curse Stimulant Pills to go save Guren himself.

21.SummaryEnglish: Thanks to his "experimentation," Yu makes a miraculous recovery and once again, goes back to save Guren. Pushing too hard, Yu nearly becomes a demon, but Kimizuki stops him by force. The squad carries Yu out and heads for safety, but then encounters Mika.

22.SummaryEnglish: Yu and Mika are finally reunited, but the injuries Mika had sustained from fighting the Demon Company threatens his life. Determined to keep Mika alive, Yu tries to persuade Mika into drinking his blood... Even if it means Mika will become a true vampire.

23.SummaryEnglish: After escaping, the remaining survivors of the Moon Demon Company get to the rendezvous point. Instead of continuing with the rescue, their orders are simply to "standby." Enraged, they decide to ignore the orders and go to save Guren, when Kureto appears. Apparently, Kureto has other plans.

24.SummaryEnglish: Kureto plays his trump card: Kimizuki's younger sister, Mirai. Mirai is revealed to be inside the container and emerged as an angel of the Fifth Trumpet. After doing battle, Mika escapes with Yu, Makoto, and the rest of Shinoa Squad. Shinoa declares they all quit being members of the Japanese Imperial Demon Army.
